Seriously those of you who are complaining about the NTR genre are honestly hopeless and pathetic. In many ways, that is. First, get it right, this is fiction. We come here to enjoy those fantasy. Of course almost no one wanna be cucked irl (well maybe except for some who have a few loose screws in their heads?) so get it right! Don't shit on what others enjoy, especially if it's FUCKING FANTASY. Second, if you don't like something then you can just close the tab! Simple as that! I personally hate the furry and futanari tag so what do I do? Do I stay and leave a comment about how those 2 genres are sick and those like them have problems? Fucking hell no. 

Of course I'm no one to talk since I'm also wasting my time here on a site for eromanga and arguing for those similar to me, but please guys, you have a brain inside your head. Use it.
